title: ChangeOfLocation
description: Representation of an NROD COL message.

original_loc_timestamp.title: The planned time associated with the original location

current_train_id.title: If the TRUST ID has been changed, this is the current one

train_file_address.title: TOPS train file address, if applicable

dep_timestamp.title: The departure time at the location the train is COL

original_loc_stanox.title: If the location has been revised, the original STANOX

event_timestamp.title: The timestamp of the COO transaction
